擇.definition: to select; to choose; to pick over; to pick out; to differentiate; to eliminate; also pr. [zhai2]

擇不開.definition: impossible to separate; impossible to disentangle; cannot take time out

擇刺.definition: to pick out the bones in a fish

擇善固執.definition: to choose what is good and hold fast to it (idiom)

擇善而從.definition: to choose the right course and follow it (idiom)

擇日.definition: to fix a date (for an event); to select an auspicious date

擇日不如撞日.pinyin: zé rì bù rú zhuàng rì
擇日不如撞日.definition: lit. carefully setting an auspicious date does not beat seizing an opportunity (idiom); fig. seize the occasion

擇機.definition: at the right time; when appropriate

擇菜.definition: to pick the edible part of vegetables
